headline: Wabtec Declares Regular Quarterly Common Dividend
summary: PITTSBURGH, May 15, 2025--Wabtec Corporation (NYSE: WAB) announced today that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly common dividend of 25 cents per share, payable on June 10, 2025, to holders of record on May 27, 2025.

raw.headline: Wabtec Declares Regular Quarterly Common Dividend
